Package islandtrader.core

Class RandomEvent

java.lang.Object
islandtrader.core.Entity
islandtrader.core.RandomEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Pirate, RescuedSailor, UnfortunateWeather
public abstract class RandomEvent
extends Entity
implements java.lang.Cloneable
Represents the Random Events that the Trader may encounter while sailing. The Trader can encounter Pirates, Unfortunate Weather or Sailors to rescue. Each will have a different action in the game. These are allocated randomly to the Routes of each Island.
Author:
Maria Heloisa Balzaretti

  • Method Details

    • clone

      public java.lang.Object clone() throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
      To be able to use the event with different properties.
      Throws:
      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException

    • getPercentageChanceOfEncounter

      public float getPercentageChanceOfEncounter()
      Used to set the chance of the random encounter for each route. i.e. percentage in the format 0.2 to represent 20%.
      Returns:
      the percentage of chance of a given RandomEvent happening.

    • setPercentageChanceOfEncounter

      public void setPercentageChanceOfEncounter​(float percentageChanceOfEncounter)
      Sets the percentage chance of a given RandomEvent happening. i.e. percentage in the format 0.2 to represent 20%.
      Parameters:
      percentageChanceOfEncounter - is the new percentage chance for the event.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Override toString method to give a background about the RandomEvent.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • randomEventSpecificAction

      public abstract void randomEventSpecificAction​(Trader myTrader)
      This method is to be implemented depending on each RandomEvent specific context.
      Parameters:
      myTrader - will endure the actions from the random events

    • encounterMessage

      public abstract java.lang.String encounterMessage()
      A message used to inform the Trader of the encounter.
      Returns:
      string to be set in each specific event

    • resultOfEncounterMessage

      public abstract java.lang.String resultOfEncounterMessage()
      A message used to inform the Trader of the outcome of the RandomEvent
